OrgName.entry: NEWTON HALL SENIOR CITIZENS - SEQUENCE DANCING

Desc.entry: Sequence dance club. Also offers ballroom dancing, line dancing, tap dancing, ballet and ballerina dances, and Latin American dances.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 7.15pm (modern sequence dancing); Tues 9.15-11.15am (Treetop Tuesdays, term-time only), 6.15-10.30pm (line dancing); Wed 10am-12noon (learners sequence dancing), 1st, 2nd and 3rd Wed in the month 7.15pm (social sequence dancing); Thurs 4.30-7.45pm (Pickering Dance Academy), 8-9.30pm (learners sequence dancing); Fri 9-11.45am (play group), 12.30-3.15pm (social sequence dancing), 2nd Fri in the month 8-11pm (line dancing); Sat 9.30am-2.45pm (Pickering Dance Academy), 1st and 3rd Sat in the month 7.15-10.15pm (modern sequence dancing), 2nd and 4th Sat in the month 7.15-10.15pm (social sequence dancing); Sun 7.30-10pm (ballroom and Latin American dancing)
